Text:
Please seed to at least 1.0 ratio so everyone can download the files.

Don't hit and run!...
Doesn't PeerBlock automatically connect to its parent servers and download these "blocklists" automatically?

@NZPirates: Yes, PeerBlock downloads the standard block lists but they don't include every single IP addresses listed in my block lists.

Don't believe me? Compare what PeerBlock downloaded against my block lists and see for yourself...
@queue2: PeerBlock is free. Check their website for more info.
